item.title: Add comments to Hugo with utterances
item.description: tl;dr Add the utterances GitHub app to your GitHub Pages repo utterances uses GitHub Issues to manage the comments, so it needs authorization Go through the utterances setup to create the script blob that will add comments to your blog posts. Check your theme documentation to determine where you should add your utterances script blob. Regenerate the static site (> hugo), and push the modified post contents.
